message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. It's a fair starting point.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split this time. Let's be reasonable - time is money!
Bob, my offer still stands. This is a good deal for both of us, especially considering the inflation.  Let's be practical and wrap this up.
Alice, it seems we both value our time.  This is my final offer reflecting a slight edge for you considering the inflation. Let's close this deal now and both walk away with something.
